item.title: GSoC 2022 Proposal Sent
item.description: About me: I’m Nicolás from Argentina. I have a background in acoustics, digital signal processing and audio. In the last couple of years I became interested in deep learning audio applications and would like to combine my previous knowledge with new and exciting developments. I have a bachelor degree in Audiovisual Technologies (UNLA) and I’m currently studying to get a diploma in programming at UTN (Universidad Tecnológica Nacional) in Buenos Aires.
